Academic & Support Resources








Main Content Region



Academic & Support Resources


















Faculty Affairs and Development
The goal of Academic Personnel is to provide you with excellent service and the necessary support and guidance for faculty related affairs. We will help you find the needed tools and resources to help you succeed at CSUSB.

Academic Personnel
Faculty Information Manual
Job Opportunities
Unit 11 Posting
RPT
SOTE Calendar
WASC















Office of the Registrar
The Office of the Registrar is committed to helping students meet their degree objectives by building positive working relationships, leading them through their academic careers today for successful professions tomorrow.

Academic Renewal
Adding a Class
Adding or Dropping after Census
Auditing Courses
Change of Major
Concurrent Enrollment
Credit By Exam
Definition of Grades
Dropping a Class
Grade Grievance
PAWS (Program Advising Worksheet for Students)
Registration Dates
Transcript Request















Academic Success and Undergraduate Advising
The Office of Academic Success and Undergraduate Advising is devoted to helping all undergraduate students succeed at CSUSB offering a wide range of academic services for students. We also assist with outreach to schools in our service area, oversee special majors, coordinate the general education curriculum in conjunction with the Faculty Senate General Education Committee, and collaborate across colleges and divisions on projects to promote student success.

Advising & Academic Services
Early Assessment Program (EAP)
Early Start Program
Educational Opportunity Program
Honors Program
Tutoring Program
Student Assistance in Learning (SAIL)
Student Mentoring Program (SMP)
Supplemental Instruction
Testing Office
Writing Center















Research
CSUSB offers a number of institutes and centers to facilitate, support and provide resources for students and faculty mentors with the goal of publication, presentation, performance, or exhibition of the results or products.

Academic Research
Criminal Justice Research
Health Disparities Research and Training, Center for the Promotion of (CPHDRT)
Institutional Review Board
Learning Research Institute
Maximizing Access Research Careers (MARC)
Research & Sponsored Programs
Student Research
